name.en: Using R for linear model analysis in cognitive science
name.ch: R語言暨應用線性模型於認知科學

department.ch: 認知神經科學研究所碩士班

goal.ch: "對基礎統計學之觀念及理論做總整理，強調統計方法在心理語言學相關研究的應用能力和解題技巧，及介紹深入的統計方法，如 ANOVA, Linear Regression, Logistic Regression,及線性混合模型。修課學生將在課程中學習R語言，利用編寫程式完成資料分析"
goal.en: "Review the overall methods of statistics such as descriptive statistics, hypothesis testing, ANOVA, linear regression, logistic regression, and linear-mixed model. The instruction will focus on the application of statistics in psycholinguistic researches. In this course students will learn how to program in R and how to use R for effective data analysis."

outline.ch:
"第01週：R 資料物件
第02週：編輯數據與迴圈
第03週：變異數分析
第04週：視覺化工具
第05週：簡單線性迴歸
第06週：邏輯迴歸分析
第07週：建立階層式迴歸模型
第08週：期中考
第09週：線性混合模型
第10週：連續型反應與LMM模型
第11週：類別式反應與GLMM模型
第12週：正交化對比
第13週：維度與共線性
第14週：檢視G/LMM模型
第15週：應用LMM於腦波數據分析(1)
第16週：應用LMM於腦波數據分析(2)
第17週：非線性模性
第18週：期末報告"
outline.en:
"week 1 R data types
week 2 data manipulation
week 3 ANOVA
week 4 data visualization
week 5 linear regression
week 6 categorical data and logistic regression
week 7 building hierarchical regression models
week 8 midterm exam
week 9 linear-mixed effect models
week 10 using linear-mixed models with continuous variables
week 11 using linear-mixed models with categorical variables
week 12 effects coding
week 13 dimension reduction: PCA, SVD, and tSNE
week 14 interpreting fixed effects and random effects
week 15 single-trial analysis with EEG/MEG data (1)
week 16 single-trial analysis with EEG/MEG data (2)
week 17 SVM and neural network approaches
week 18 wrap-up and discussion"

textbook.en:
"Kirk, R. E. (1974).?Experimental design: Procedures for the behavioral sciences. Belmont, CA: Brooks/Cole.
Long, J. D. (2012).?Longitudinal data analysis for the behavioral sciences using R. Sage."
